body: Lost marriage and a broken son, congratulations you hit  a new peak of insanity!
Someone doesn't know what netorare means

Ah yes... the woman's sexual liberation, that was a good father, cares about the kid and the consequences for acting up like loose fool on the internet, some people just don't get how dangerous it is in regards to its sheer potential at destroying ones life, especially internet boomer types who all of this is new to them, they are from a radio/t.v era and those devices were a one way outward exposition, whereas the internet can be both out & inwards from the public, she wouldn't done such thing in the streets, failed to realize that through a livestream, it's the same as if she had done it out in public. Japanese public social image is a thing they are willing to through great length to conserve it, for they are ruthless and they know it, they know that one fuck up is all it takes and regaining can be an arduous task with no guarantees for success; E.G: AKB48 idol gets caught walking in or out of a place with a lover, cue her getting suspended, shaves her head as apology, still booted.
Wasn't ntr at all. She fucked up and masterbated on cam and got kicked out.
